content:
Hello!

It’s official: Managed Postgres on Fly.io is ready for primetime. Push a button, pick a size, get a connection string, and leave the boring stuff to us.

Here’s what you get:

High-availability Postgres cluster (primary + replica)
Easy scaling (CPU, RAM, storage)
Automated backups and recovery
Built-in connection pooling
Automatic encryption at rest and in transit
Performance monitoring and metrics
24/7 support and incident response
Support for pgvector extension

Gone are the days of babysitting your databases. Now you can focus on building your app while we handle keeping your data safe, fast, and online.

Pricing is simple and transparent, with no surprises. Create a cluster from within your Fly.io dashboard or using the flyctl (all the details can be found in the docs).

Got questions or ideas? Hit reply or open up a support ticket. We’re always listening (really).

Thanks for your patience and feedback during early access. Go forth and Postgres confidently!

– The Fly.io Team
hi how r u bro i have million dollar deal just sign here

Hi Rafael, how are you?
As I explained during our call, we are moving you to the next step of our process: a Take-Home Challenge!
Please, take a look at the attached document - it contains all the necessary information. You have 24 hours to send back this challenge, starting now :)
Once you complete this task, please send it back to us here and we will take a look at your result.
In case you have any questions, feel free to ask us - I copied Sanford on this email, our Head of AI, in case you have any technical doubts!
Best,

Hi Rafael,

As we stand at the brink of a technological revolution, the demand for skilled professionals in the field of Data Science is skyrocketing. Understanding this, we have meticulously designed the Certified AI & ML BlackBelt Plus Program. Do you know why our program stands out?

Extensive Curriculum: Spanning over 27+ courses, our meticulously designed curriculum covers everything from the basics to advanced concepts in Data Science, Machine Learning, and Data Engineering. You'll start with the fundamentals, delving into statistics and data analysis, before progressing to complex topics like machine learning and big data technologies. Each module is crafted to ensure a smooth learning curve, making it ideal for beginners and those looking to upskill.

Cutting-Edge Tools: In data science, tools are your best allies. We provide hands-on experience with industry-leading tools like Python, R, SQL, TensorFlow, and Tableau. These aren't just tutorials; you'll use these tools on real-world datasets, solving actual problems, ensuring you're job-ready from day one.

The AI & ML BlackBelt Plus Program isn't just an educational journey; it's a leap towards mastering 23+ tools.

Ready to leverage this power-packed opportunity? We're here to guide you every step of the way.

Boa tarde RAFAEL
